name: Weapon Car Rider: Highway Shooting Race-r 3D
name_original: Weapon Car Rider: Highway Shooting Race-r 3D
description:
Race the streets, Speed up, Turbo, and Drift your car as fast as you can! Win more races to upgrade to better and more powerful cars!
Weapon Car Rider is an endless and free game with challenges, many different fast cars, and exciting levels to unlock. It is simple and extremely fun to play! Speed up through roads and avoid other vehicles such as moto bikes, trucks, bus and collect coins by winning and top high scores! Use the coins to upgrade your car or purchase other faster cars!
Weapon Car Rider is a fast-paced realistic 3D racing game that will provide adrenaline and excitement as a racer! READY, GET SET, GO!!! Get Weapon Car Rider....

FEATURES:
AWESOME REALISTIC 3D MAPS
REAL GAME PHYSICS
CHALLENGING GAMEPLAY
ENDLESS GAME
HD SOUNDS FOR MAXIMUM ENTERTAINMENT

INSTRUCTIONS
- Tilt or Steer to drive your car
- Avoid Cars and Trucks to get better scores!
- Collect Coins to Upgrade your cars!

TIPS: Collect the coins get faster cars!!!
